title: BOTS in league
body:
Now I'm not one to post in these forums usually. But this is getting out of hand. I've encountered BOTS in my games that literally ints during my promos, not ONCE but TWICE. What is even going on anymore? 

My recent game had a garen that built armor against a SINGED, never got his ULT upgraded until 20 minutes into the game, and to top it off, every game this LVL30 account played - he feeds. What is riot actually doing to stop these unmanned accounts from being created? I would like to know as having bots in your promos isn't the best feeling to have. SMH

replies.body:
I wouldn't waste your time asking on the forums, Riot don't seem to like responding about the bot problem to their PAYING players who keep this game alive.

My guess is 

a) They have no idea how to fix the problem.

and/or

b) It mainly happens in ARAM and not ranked so they don't really care.

Either way I'm just glad I don't need to spend anymore real money on this game, between the bots, leavers, AFK'ers and trash talking 'gg ez' scrubs it's not worth investing money in anymore.
